other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm with normal underlying rate; 2 runs of APC vs SVT x3 beats and 1 run of APCs vs. SVT x4 beats; normal axis; +LVH; poor baseline, unable to discern any significant ST-TW changes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Compared with prior on ___ no significant changes.

other_tests.findings: Testes are heterogeneous bilaterally with punctate nonshadowing echogenicities compatible with microlithiasis; cysts in right epididymis; bilateral hydroceles noted, left greater than right.
